thread.title: Besides Lackey in Game 1, Matheny mum on rotation
thread.title_full: Besides Lackey in Game 1, Matheny mum on rotation

title: Besides Lackey in Game 1, Matheny mum on rotation
text:
> Top News Besides Lackey in Game 1, Matheny mum on rotation St. Louis Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina, left, talks with manager Mike Matheny during baseball practice on Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in St. Louis. The Cardinals will face either the Pittsburgh Pirates or the Chicago Cubs in Game 1 of the NLDS on Friday in St. Louis. (AP Photo/Jeff Roberson)
